About

I am a postdoctoral scholar in the algebra group at the University of Kentucky, where I work with Uwe Nagel on problems in computational mathematics and commutative algebra. I am currently on the job market.

  • Mathematica
  • Macaulay2
  • SageMath
  • GAP

Publications

  1. Local cohomology, determinantal ideals and Rees algebras.
    With Jennifer Kenkel. In progress.
  2. Minimal resolutions for modules over polynomial OI-algebras.
    With Uwe Nagel. In preparation.
  3. Gröbner bases and the Cohen-Macaulay property of Li’s double determinantal varieties
    With Patricia Klein. Submitted.
  4. Topological Complexity of Graphic Arrangements
    Topological complexity and related topics, vol. 702 of Contemp. Math., Amer. Math. Soc., Providence, RI, 2018, pp. 121-132.
  5. Polynomial Interpolation in Higher Dimensions: From Simplicial Complexes to GC Sets
    with Hal Schenck. SIAM Journal of Numerical Analysis, 55 (2017), 131-143.
  6. Classification of Groups with Strong Symmetric Genus up to Twenty-Five
    With Tova Lindberg, Tyler London, Holden Tran, Haokun Xu. Houston journal of mathematics 39(1) · March 2011.
